# Marine Planning Profile

This page provides information about marine planning initiatives relevant to Pacific salmon conservation.

## Overview

Marine planning integrates conservation and management considerations across marine ecosystems where Pacific salmon spend portions of their life cycle.

## Marine Planning Areas

- Coastal marine areas
- Estuarine environments
- Near-shore habitats
- Open ocean zones

## Key Planning Elements

- Habitat mapping
- Species distribution
- Human use patterns
- Conservation priorities
- Climate change considerations

## Integration with Salmon Conservation

How marine planning supports Pacific salmon conservation objectives:
- Critical habitat protection
- Migration corridor conservation
- Feeding area management
- Climate adaptation planning

## Resources

Marine planning documents, maps, and tools.
